com.expertdesk.edplus
Class Server

java.lang.Object
  com.expertdesk.edplus.Server

public class Server
extends java.lang.Object

The server object wraps a connection to the AR System, and is a starting point for common tasks.

Author:
Hugo Visser

Constructor Detail

Server

public Server(com.remedy.arsys.api.ARServerUser context)
Create a new Server object, wrapping an existing ARServerUser object

Parameters:
context - the context to wrap

Server

public Server(java.lang.String login)
       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Create a new Server from a login string. The login string must have the following format: user[:password]@server[:tcpPort[:rpcNum]]. To login as user Demo on server "test" with no password use "Demo@test"

Parameters:
login - the login string
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the login string does not match the format.

Server

public Server(java.lang.String user,
              java.lang.String password,
              java.lang.String authentication,
              java.util.Locale locale,
              java.lang.String server,
              int tcpPort,
              int rpcNum)
Create a new Server

Parameters:
user - username
password - password
authentication - authentication
locale - locale
server - server to login to
tcpPort - the tcp port or 0 to use the portmapper
rpcNum - the rpc number or 0 to use the default rpc number

              java.lang.String password,
              java.lang.String server)
Create a new Server for the given user, password and server combination

user - username
password - password
server - server to login to
